text: Hey <@U7W16RDQT> I had a bug in a module a couple days ago where my image wasn’t being shown in the template preview. I was able to get it to work by removing the module from the page, save/publish and then re-adding it....worth a try.
did you moved the field to a group? is this group repeatable? those options will change the way you have to call the var.

I'm having an issue where I've got a flexible column in a blog post and I've added some modules, but now I can't delete them. Clicking delete on either the page or in the edit modules panel does nothing. Has this ever happened to anyone?
I might be having a similar issue actually

I have a blog post - it doesn’t have a flex column - but weirdly all of a sudden when you enter content into a rich text field that’s under edit modules it, it doesn’t save the content. it gets wiped from the field
